values:
I have been thinking about sin and remember the Bible saying even our most righteous is as dirty rags to God.  Makes me wonder, we must be blind to some sins, is it a cultural thing or are we just not mentally able to handle how we are if we see all sin?

On another note, I was gone for a while and when I came back EllieV is writing this GREAT "Thoughtcrimes" story and the first week there are three new chapters and now only one a week. I am dying here, Kraidydragon should write another "Thoughtcrimes" story, she is good at whumping.

Watched the first season "Dexter" this last weekend.  Loved it! Absolutely loved it!  Almost up there with SGA.  I fill conflicted though, should I like something that puts serial killers in a "better" light?  Even if he is only killing other serial killers, it somehow still does not seem right.  

Well those are my recent thoughts.  I will probably hibernate for a long while before I write again.  I keep forgetting that I have a place to put my thoughts.

Well Kodiak asks us to fill this out so here is mine.

1. Can you cook? Yes and Bake!!
2. What was your dream growing up? I'm 45 is that grown up??  Many dreams, ahhhh, Seeing the World  
3. What talent do you wish you had?  
4. Favorite place? Oregon/Mountains
5. Favorite vegetable? Green Peppers
6. What was the last book you read? Cusor's Fury and Schlepping Through the Alps
7. What zodiac sign are you? No idea
8. Any Tattoos and/or Piercings? Just ears I am going to get a little Tatoo!
9. Worst Habit? Reading or Sleeping in (No childred)
10. Do we know each other outside of Livejournal? no
11. What is your favorite sport? walking(can that be a sport?)  I guess I can call it hiking.  Is that a sport?  How about Volleyball.
12. Do you have a Negative or Optimistic attitude? Optimistic
13. What would you do if you were stuck in an elevator with me? Try to ignore you unless you started talking, then I would feel obligated to talk.  Not a people person!  People make me nervous.
14. Worst thing to ever happen to you? Almost drown when I was 8. 
15. Tell me one weird fact about you.  I hate cheese, but love pizza(food of the gods).
16. Do you have any pets? Two dogs Lilly and Ginger/Olivia. I am picking up G/O Thursday!
17. Do you know how to do the Macarena? NO, thank goodness.
18. What time is it where you are now? 8:30PM
19. Do you think clowns are cute or scary?  Cute
20. If you could change one thing about how you look, what would it be?  Add a few inches to my mid-section so I would have some space between my breasts and waist.
21. Would you be my partner in crime or my conscience?  Hmmmm, depends on what you are doing!  Probably conscience though.
22. What color eyes do you have? Brown
23. Ever been arrested? No
24. Bottle or Draft? Draft if I drink at all.
25. If you won $10,000 dollars today, what would you do with it?  Books and Dinner out.  Bills and go to China.  My brother lives there right now.  Just airfare!
26. What kind of bubble gum do you prefer to chew? None
27. What's your favorite bar to hang at? No bar, don't really drink
28. Do you believe in ghosts? Sorta of.
29. Favorite thing to do in your spare time?  Read or eat
30. Do you swear a lot? No
31. Biggest pet peeve? None that I can think of. 
32. In one word, how would you describe yourself? Shy 
33. In one word, how would you describe me? Friendly
34. Will you repost this so I can fill it out and do the same for you? yes


1. Male or Female? Female
2. Fandom you most associate with? SGA
3. Fandom you associate me with? SGA
4. Chocolate or Vanilla? Ice cream: Vanilla, all others CHOCOLATE!
5. Coke or Sprite? Coke
6. One person you'd give anything to meet? Jesus, Elizabeth I, Hatshepsut, Harry S Truman and (in a whisper) JF
7. The most famous person you've met? None
8. Something about you that you think I should know. Not a people person, at a lost sometimes
9. One thing you're dying to have.  House
